income_tax_description: To receive payments via the Fastwork system, freelancers must verify and agree to provide their income information for tax authorities to review compliance with legal requirements.
step_1_note: Once verified, this information cannot be changed (please contact support)
step_2_note: You can download the document here
step_3_note: Digital signatures are not accepted; document must be signed by hand
step_4_note: You can upload files in .pdf, .png, or .jpg format up to 10MB
step_4_title: Take a Photo and Upload via Fastwork
